title: Calories in 3x3 In-N-Out Burger
meta_description: Discover 3x3 in n out calories: 1090 kcal per burger, plus full nutrition breakdown including protein, fat, carbs, sodium, and tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Standard 3x3 burger with 3 beef patties, 3 cheese slices, lettuce, tomato, onion, spread, on toasted bun; no modifications.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, and customizations; values based on In-N-Out's published data. Check app or receipt for latest.

quick_answer.text: The 3x3 In-N-Out burger packs 1090 kcal with 71 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Protein style (bun replaced with lettuce wrap)

faqs.q: How many calories in a 3x3 In-N-Out burger?
What's the protein in 3x3 in n out calories breakdown?
faqs.a: About 71 g protein from the three beef patties and cheese.

faqs.q: How much fat and sodium in a 3x3 In-N-Out?
faqs.a: 73 g total fat (32 g saturated) and 2440 mg sodium.

faqs.q: Are 3x3 in n out calories higher than a Double-Double?
faqs.a: Yes, about 420 kcal more than the 670 kcal Double-Double.

faqs.q: Can I lower 3x3 in n out calories with mods?
faqs.a: Yesâ€”skip the spread to save 90 kcal or go protein style to cut 240 kcal.
